body:
The error message seems to deal with babel and i18n, which is for translated docs. Since pandas does not use this, this seems more an issue with your sphinx installation. 

Can you try with a small test project to see if this builds correctly? (see sphinx quickstart)

BTW, sphinx-rtd-theme is no dependency for the pandas docs

sphinx-rtd-theme was installed automatically together with  sphinx (pip3 install sphinx).

I uninstalled Babel, and installed sphinx again:

```
C:\Windows\system32>c:\Python34\Scripts\pip.exe install sphinx
Downloading/unpacking sphinx
  Downloading Sphinx-1.3.1.tar.gz (3.5MB): 3.5MB downloaded
  Running setup.py egg_info for package sphinx

    warning: no files found matching 'TODO'
    no previously-included directories found matching 'doc\_build'
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): six>=1.4 in c:\python34\lib\site-packages (from sphinx)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): Jinja2>=2.3 in c:\python34\lib\site-packages (from sphinx)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): Pygments>=2.0 in c:\python34\lib\site-packages (from sphinx)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): docutils>=0.11 in c:\python34\lib\site-packages (from sphinx)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): snowballstemmer>=1.1 in c:\python34\lib\site-packages (from sphinx)
Downloading/unpacking babel>=1.3 (from sphinx)
  Downloading Babel-2.0.tar.gz (3.4MB):  21%  749kB
```

Then I was back to those Babel errors. Since this isn't a pandas problem, feel free to close this issue.
